p: Blood samples (buffy coats) from healthy donors were obtained anonymously from the Hemotherapy Service at the Hospital Universit√°rio Clementino Fraga Filho (HUCFF) of Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro (UFRJ). The study protocol was approved by the Experimental Ethics Committee of UFRJ (Permit Number: IMPPG 025), and the review board waived the need for informed patient consent.
